body:
Comment 2 by **RogerCritchlow**: 
Fine, attached is test.go, a very short extract from pulse.go, which generates the error:

test.go:16:20: expected '}', found ';'
test.go:18:1: expected declaration, found '}'

when compiled with "cgo -- test.go".  

Comment out the import "C" and it compiles fine with 6g.  

Add the optional comma to the composite literal and it cgo stops complaining.

This is with revision:

8884f7b4c775 release/release.2010-08-04
Attachments: 1. test.go (245 bytes)
